attributes.action: build a park in west croydon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: croydon general site london road kids playpark deemed nesessary by pychologists would be pleasant haven in concrete jungle land to be given to council manpower paid for by led zepelin etc etc

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
